synopsis.text:
Mitsukiâ€™s life takes an unexpected turn when her mother remarries, and she finds herself living with a new stepbrother, Yuuya. As she grapples with her feelings towards her new family, Mitsuki is suddenly possessed by the spirit of Hiyori, a young girl with unfinished business. Hiyori's unrequited love for Yuuya has left her unable to pass through the Gates of Heaven, and she believes that consummating her love through Mitsuki's body is the key to her salvation.

As Mitsuki navigates the challenges of sharing her body with a pushy, amorous ghost, she must also confront her own growing feelings for Yuuya. With Hiyori's antics constantly pushing her towards her stepbrother, Mitsuki must decide if she can trust her new family and open her heart to love. Will Mitsuki be able to help Hiyori move on, or will she find herself falling for Yuuya in the process? Join Mitsuki on her hilarious and heartwarming journey to find out in this romantic comedy about love, family, and the supernatural.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
